recipe.title: Cooper's Union Cocktail
ingredients: 3/4 ounce (1 1/2 tablespoons) fresh pink grapefruit juice
3/4 ounce (1 1/2 tablespoons) simple syrup (see cooks' note, below)
1/4 cup plus 2 tablespoons Gruet Brut sparkling wine, chilled
instructions: Stir together all ingredients except sparkling wine in a mixing glass.
Pour into Champagne flute, then top off with sparkling wine.
